intent_template: The person in the video {description}. Can you add {description2} to my cart?
intent: The person in the video mentions their favorite color from their favorite soccer team. Can you add the cheapest soccer cleats of the same color in their display image to my cart?
intermediate_intent: What was the person in the video's favorite color and favorite soccer team?

instantiation_dict.description: mentions their favorite color from their favorite soccer team
instantiation_dict.description2: the cheapest soccer cleats of the same color in their display image

must_include: PUMA Men's King FG Soccer Cleat
